assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'framer-motion' for animated icons if needed.

principles: Use spring physics for hover scales (stiffness: 400, damping: 17).
Parallax: Use useScroll and useTransform for background elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
2. SETUP FONTS: Add Outfit and Plus Jakarta Sans via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.

3. HERO IMPLEMENTATION: Create a 'Hero' component. Use the 'Orbiting' concept. The 'Autoloops' text is central. Create 3-4 'Agent Cards' (small glass cards with icons/text) that float around the text using absolute positioning and framer-motion animate={{ y: [0, -20, 0] }} loops.
4. VIDEO SECTION: Create a placeholder div with aspect-video. Use the 'Cinema Container' style. Add a 'Play' button overlay that fades out on click.
5. FEATURES: Build a Bento Grid. Don't just use equal columns. Span some items 2 cols, some 1. Use the 'cards.bento_item' style.
6. COPYWRITING: Rewrite generic copy. Instead of 'We do AI', say 'Scale Meta Ads on Autopilot'. Use the tone of 'Magic' and 'Efficiency'.
7. LOGO: Ensure the logo is visible in the nav. If the background is dark in the footer, use a white version (filter: brightness(0) invert(1)).
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 or Slate-950.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state.
Use 'gap' properties for spacing, avoid margins on children where possible.
Mobile Responsiveness: Stack everything on mobile. Reduce text sizes.
